# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  tags test13.cir DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} test13.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP test13.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} test13.cir ${OutputDataDir}/TEST13/test13.cir.prn test13.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED test13.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY} test13.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP test13.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} test13.cir ${OutputDataDir}/TEST13/test13.cir.prn test13.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED test13.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}TEST13/test13.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind")
endif()
